forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 39, with temperatures rising to around 41 overnight. South southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow before 7am, then a chance of rain and snow between 7am and 8am, then a chance of rain and snow between 8am and 11am. Partly sunny. High near 46, with temperatures falling to around 44 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
